entries.err_cannot_open_noncombat_ship: This is a non-combat ship and cannot be upgraded or modified.
entries.help_button_repair:
Repair Ship Component

When a ship component is damaged, the repair button becomes available. If you have the appropriate repair pack in your inventory, you can repair the ship component here.
entries.help_button_unload:
Unload Current Ship Component

Click this button to unload a ship component from your ship.
entries.help_button_load:
Load Selected Ship Component

Click this button to load the selected ship component onto your ship.
entries.help_components_installed:
Installed Ship Component

This shows information and statistics for the ship component currently loaded in the component slot you have selected.
entries.help_components_selected:
Selected Ship Component

This shows information and statistics for a ship component you select in the Ship Component Inventory.
entries.help_inventory:
Inventory of Ship Components

These are ship components that you own. This includes both ship components in your inventory as well as those currently loaded on your ship.

This inventory list is broken down into categories of ship component types which correspond to component slots on your ship.
entries.not_near_terminal: While away from a space terminal, you may view but not modify your ship.
entries.err_cannot_open_ship_not_certified: You are not certified for this ship and can't manage it.
entries.err_cannot_open_newbie_ship: This is a starter ship and cannot be upgraded.
entries.err_component_not_certified: You are not certified to install  this component.
entries.err_too_heavy: Installing this component would overload your ship's mass.
